title: All the Backlist! October 25, 2019
description:
This week, Liberty discusses two great older books, including The Good House.
This episode is sponsored by TBR, Book Riot’s new subscription service offering tailored book recommendations for readers of all stripes.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Twisted Ones by T. Kingfisher
The Return by Rachel Hoffman
The Good House by Tananarive Due
The Elementals by Michael McDowell
Blood Countess (A Lady Slayers Novel) by Lana Popović
The Blood Countess by Andrei Codrescu
The Progeny by Tosca Lee
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
